body:
Patch eospac's Makefile.-linux-gnu.hashes to consider only `$(notdir $(F90))` when constructing a key to look up compiler flags in the _F90-CPUINFO_COMP_FLAGS associative array.

This patch was accepted into eospac itself after the release of 6.4.2beta, so apply it only to 6.4.2beta and earlier releases.
title: eospac: add cpuinfo_comp_flags_key.patch
